DOC.brief_title: Oxytocin vs. Prostaglandin Induction Labor Primiparas With Prelabor Rupture Membrane Low Bishop
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study compare oxytocin prostaglandin ( PGE2 ) , regard time induction labor ( IOL ) delivery among primiparas term prelabor rupture membrane ( PROM ) unfavorable cervix . Our secondary outcome compare group regard obstetric complication include : cesarean delivery , operative vaginal delivery , maternal intrapartum fever , postpartum hemorrhage , Apgar score 5 minute ≤ 7 , PH , admission NICU time initiation induction active labor . The study population include primiparous term PROM unfavorable bishop score ( ≤3 ) . Subsequent confirm inclusion criterion receive informed consent parturients randomly allocate receive oxytocin PGE2 . Induction oxytocin ( group 1 ) initiate infusion intravenous oxytocin : 2.5 mIU per minute increment 2.5 mIU every 20 minute achieve 4-5 contraction 10 minute . Then continuous infusion without increase oxytocin dose continue . In case lack painful contraction/active labor 24 hour oxytocin trial PGE2 initiate ( describe group 2 ) Induction PGE2 ( group 2 ) initiate insert posterior fornix PGE2 2 mg , repeat every 6 hour achieve painful contraction 4 dos ( 24 hour ) . In case lack painful contraction/active labor fourth dose PGE2 trial oxytocin initiate ( described group1 ) . Failed induction define parturients fail develop active labor 48 hour initiation induction . Decisions regard management labor include aspect labor ( augmentation , delivery , postpartum ) make physician charge base standard labor room .
DOC.criteria: Age 1838 year Primiparas Term ( 3742 ) EFW 25004000 PROM < 12 hour Confirmed PROM No painful contraction Vertex presentation Willing induce Bishop score : ( 3 less ) cervix : elongate , posterior , close , firmmedium , head SP1 high Intrauterine growth retardation preterm < 37 week painful contraction Other reason induction aside PROM : severe PIH , uncontrolled GDM Medical condition researcher think affect outcome
